attributes.action: demand the resigination of organiser/ceo of hbos of party in Edinburgh costing taxpayers £330.000 while laughing at people having homes repossessed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Digusting and morally repugnant party held at 5 star hotel in Edinburgh.
Shows utter contempt that these banks and fat cat bankers have for the british taxpayer, if they want to party pay for it themselves.- they can well afford it !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
